objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#f5f5f7;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#e6e6e6;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#0071e3;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#0071e3;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#d1d1d6' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><rect x='70' y='70' width='940' height='940' rx='15' stroke='#d1d1d6' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M0,200 C250,180 400,250 550,230 C750,200 900,150 1080,180 L1080,0 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0,880 C150,900 350,850 550,880 C750,910 900,880 1080,900 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='rgba(0,113,227,0.03)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='rgba(0,113,227,0.05)'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Seamless ecosystem integration
• High-resolution Retina displays
• Latest iOS and macOS platforms
• Perfect for professionals & creatives

product_details.name: Complete Apple Ecosystem Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Package
product_details.description:
• Premium Apple MacBook Pro with Retina Display and backlit keyboard
• Seamless ecosystem integration across all three devices
• iPad with stunning edge-to-edge display, perfect for productivity and entertainment
• Latest iPhone model with advanced camera system
• All devices feature high-resolution displays with vibrant color reproduction
• macOS and iOS platforms for maximum compatibility and productivity
• Powerful performance for professional work and creative tasks
• Sleek aluminum design across all devices
• Built-in iCloud synchronization for seamless file sharing
• Perfect for professionals, creatives, and tech enthusiasts
• All devices in excellent condition with latest software updates
• Includes full connectivity options (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, etc.)
• Ideal for remote work, content creation, and multimedia consumption
• Premium build quality with durable construction

banner_details:
The banner is a modern, tech-themed promotional design showcasing an ecosystem of electronic devices. It features a bold, attention-grabbing top text layer (`heading`) introducing the ecosystem, followed by a sleek subheading (`subheading`) highlighting the key devices. A feature list (`description`) is presented in a bullet format, describing the benefits of these products. Below that, a large price tag (`price`) is prominently displayed to catch the viewer’s eye. A colored call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with overlay text (`cta`) invites immediate interaction. The right-aligned product image (`product_image`) visually reinforces the offering. The background uses gradients and circular shapes to give a sleek and professional feel.

**Color Palette:**
- Primary Blue: `#0071e3`
- Dark Gray: `#1d1d1f`
- Medium Gray: `#424245`
- Light Gray: `#e6e6e6`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image showcases three Apple devices with a sleek, modern aesthetic. The dominant colors include space gray (#A3AAAE) from the MacBook's body, white (#FFFFFF) from the iPad bezel, and black (#000000) used in the keyboard and screens. The laptop screen features a stunning natural wallpaper with a harmonious blend of dusky pink (#D89FA3), soft lavender (#BFA5D2), and muted sand brown (#AD8E74), giving a serene yet refined contrast. These pastel tones add softness to the metal textures. The advertisement banner can use a palette of #A3AAAE (metal gray), #D89FA3 (sunset pink), #BFA5D2 (lavender), #000000 (black), and #FFFFFF (white) for a balanced, elegant appeal.
